about_the_game:
Parisian Brasserie Simulator is a management simulation experience where you run a brasserie in the heart of the world's most visited city. Immerse yourself in the authentic atmosphere of Paris, complete with its Haussmann-style buildings, views of the Eiffel Tower, and renowned gastronomy. Turn your small brasserie into a grand Parisian institution by mastering every aspect of its management, from menu planning and staff organization to ensuring customer satisfaction.

🍽️ Prepare for opening your brasserie

You are the new owner of a brasserie located on a bustling boulevard in Paris. Take ownership of your establishment and get ready for the big opening day. Start by tidying up the place, arranging tables with care, placing your first order of raw materials, and crafting an enticing menu. Finally, open the doors to the public and welcome your first guests.

🛎️ Manage service carefully

Once doors are open, efficient service is key. Organize your team, assign tasks, and ensure every customer is served promptly and courteously. Strategically place customers in the dining area, manage orders, and make sure every visitor leaves your brasserie with a smile … and with their bill paid! The success of your establishment hinges on the quality of your service.

🍷 Run the bar

Bar management is a vital component of your brasserie. Make sure you always offer a selection of quality wines, coffees, beers, and non-alcoholic beverages. Serve drinks and coffee gracefully to ensure customer satisfaction. Manage your supplies to prevent shortages and ensure your bar is always well-stocked and appealing to customers.

📊 Master your goods and margins

Effective management of goods and profit margins is crucial for the profitability of your brasserie. Closely monitor your raw material supplies, avoid waste, and negotiate with suppliers to get the best prices. Use management tools to analyze costs, adjust prices, and maximize profits while providing quality products to your customers.

🚀 Expand your brasserie

To expand your brasserie, you will need to meet a number of criteria, such as customer satisfaction, profitability, and service quality. By achieving these goals, you will unlock new opportunities to grow your establishment and add new recipes to your menu. Each milestone reached will allow you to diversify your offerings and attract an even larger clientele, gradually transforming your brasserie into a true Parisian institution.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.3 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 5xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB VRAM / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Manage your own brasserie in Paris and turn it into the place to be! Create menus, serve customers, and master every detail to grow your restaurant. Manage supplies, ensure top-notch service, and make your mark on the city of lights. Will you become the next Parisian brasserie institution?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
